trans-unit.source: Describes the location and color of a transition point in a gradient.
Use this class to describe the colors in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.

Note that this class does not provide an opacity property; to make a GradientStop semi-transparent, set its <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property with a transparent <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>.
Freezable Features A GradientStop is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref> class with the specified color and offset.
The color value of the gradient stop.
The location in the gradient where the gradient stop is placed.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the color of the gradient stop.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The color of the gradient stop.
The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent*>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color*> dependency property.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets the location of the gradient stop within the gradient vector.
A value of 0.0 specifies that the stop is positioned at the beginning of the gradient vector, while a value of 1.0 specifies that the stop is positioned at the end of the gradient vector.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The relative location of this gradient stop along the gradient vector.
The default value is 0.0.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset*> dependency property.
To be added.
Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
The format to use.

-or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
The provider to use to format the value.

-or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
The value of the current instance in the specified format.
Creates a string representation of this object based on the current culture.
A string representation of this object that contains its <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset*> values.
Creates a string representation of this object based on the specified culture-specific formatting information.
Culture specific formatting information, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the current culture.
A string representation of this object that contains its <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset*> values.
